name: Geared Wheel
description:
Made for Weelky Game Jam 206 by me, OctoDice.

Theme : ClockWork

Musics by ChillMindscape : https://chillmindscapes.itch.io/free-chiptune-music-pack-5-chillmindscapes

Controls :

walk : Use Left & Right arrows

open and close doors : get in the mechanism and use Left & Right arrows

get out the mechanism : Up arrow

climb the wall : use Up & Down arrows
